name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Flower Lane 2: A Lingering Fragrance
storyline: Could a second chance at love really be as impossible as they say? Your ex-girlfriend still loves you, even after 7 years have passed after your break up. And she's willing to do whatever it takes to win your heart.
summary: Flower Lane 2: A Lingering Fragrance is an original maybe series. Our story, 7 years later- Seven years after college, you are no longer a young, brash freshman but a seasoned professional in your field. But things take an unexpected turn at work as you run into your ex-lover and flatmates from seven years ago...
